text: Major League is a 1989 American sports comedy movie directed by David S. Ward and starring Tom Berenger, Charlie Sheen, Wesley Snipes, Rene Russo, Corbin Bernsen, Bob Uecker, James Gammon and Margaret Whitton. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures and was followed up by two sequels. ==Other websites== * * * * * Category:1980s sports movies Category:1989 comedy movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:American sports comedy movies Category:Movies set in Cleveland Category:Movies directed by David S. Ward Category:Baseball movies Category:Movies composed by James Newton Howard Category:1980s English-language movies
title: Major League (movie)
